name: in-hera-pheri
description: Hera Pheri Bollywood comedy spinner verbs
author: JJ

verbs: Baburao ke saath scheme banate rehna
Shyam ki bewakoofi par hansi aana
Raju ki jhooth bolne ki aadat samajhna
Paisa double karne ke liye sir marna
Police ke paas se bhagna
Galat number par call karna
Kidnapping ka nakaam khel khelna
Baburao ko gussa dilana aur sorry kehna
Shyam ke upar paani pher dena
Raju apna gaddi pe jhooth bol dena
Garage mein baithkar muneem ka role karna
Paiso ka mausam dekh kar jaldibaaji karna
Baburao ki nasal par sawaal uthana
Shyam ka bewakoof plan samajhne ki koshish karna
Raju aur Shyam mein jhagra karne dena
Dhobi mein girkar bhigna aur bakwas karna
Fone par chalbaazi karke kisise paise nikalna
Baburao ka nautanki dekh kar pagal hona
Ladki ko pasand karte hue scheme fail karna
Police wale ko dekh kar pant gila hona
Bhaiya ke liye paisa arrange karte huye jhooth bolna
Scheme mein sabko apne against kar dena
Baburao se lena dena chhod dena
Shyam ki akal par thapad marna
Raju ki jugaad sunkar hasna
Ek pal mein amir ek pal mein gandha hona
Baburao ke garage ko office mein badal dena
Phone number galti se badal dena aur pachtana
Kidnapper bante huye savdhani hona
Paise ke peechey bhaagna aur property pe girna
Shyam ka note galti se pad dena
Raju ki ladki waali baat par shak karna
Baburao ka nakhre dekh kar gussa aa jana
Sab kuch lose hokar dobara paise dena
Garage mein baithkar duniya badalne ka plan banana
Ek saath sab kuch samajhne ki koshish karna
Paisa double karte hue half kho dena
Baburao aur Raju mein Shyam ko jeet hona
Fake kidnapper ban kar apna hi shatir hona
Police chase mein padh kar jaan bachhana
Bhulle bhatiyare ki tarah scheme mein bhoole rehna
Shyam ki bewakoofi aur Raju ki chalaaki mila kar
Garage ke bahar balti mein paani girna
Baburao ki diary se paisa nikalna
Phone par kisi aur ko apna secret batana
Scheme success samajhkar advance khusi manana
Raju ka jhooth half-truth mein convert hona
Dono miyan chale Lucknow jaise nikle padna
Final mein sabhi log bank mein rukhna
Hera Pheri ke baad phir se scheme sochne lagna
